      United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka

       

      Welcome to

      United Photographic Society
      of Sri Lanka

      The world faced a global epidemic coronavirus in March 2020 which is opened our eyes and made us learn something different about our life which we have not seen earlier. S. Shanmuganathan, the founder of the UPSSL Association (United Photographic Society of Sri Lanka) who is initiated for this association and showed us the value of working together as a team, encouraged us more to achieve success. Similarly, we are paying tribute to Mr. Vinayagamoorthi who helped to build our association with his maximum effort.
